definition: to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing

sentences.english: N'Djamena of Chad is ruined by civil war.
sentences.chinese: 乍得的恩賈梅納因爲內戰慘遭破壞。

sentences.english: Tom:N'Djamena of Chad is ruined by civil war.
sentences.chinese: 乍得的恩賈梅納因爲內戰慘遭破壞。

sentences.english: Ndjamena is the capital and the largest city.
sentences.chinese: 恩賈梅納爲首都和最大城市。
